name: Coin
description:
Micro-investment simulator – what will you do with your only coin? Buy a hotdog, hear a busker song or throw it into a sewer? Choose well, you have only one chance. 

What would others choose? Check out stats at the end of the game. The game was created in less than 10 hours for Ludum Dare 28, the theme was “You Only Get One“. 

Influenced by just-finished TellTales’ Walking Dead game series and its player statistics, I wanted to create a simple game that would make use of gathering player statistics. I found it highly interesting to compare my set of choices with what other players did. Much more interesting than score-based leaderboards!

Date: 12/2013 
Tools: OpenFL / HaXe, GIMP, Audacity, pug
